about.title: About Me
about.bio1: I'm a QA Analyst focused on Web, Mobile, and API test automation, working directly to reduce production risks and accelerate the delivery cycle with measurable quality. I approach quality as a strategic part of the product, ensuring that business rules, integrations, and critical flows are validated consistently and reliably.
about.bio2: In practice, I develop and maintain automated test suites using Cypress, Appium, and Robot Framework, with integration into CI/CD pipelines for continuous regression testing. I work extensively on REST API validation, covering status codes, payloads, business rules, and negative scenarios, always focusing on defect prevention.
about.bio3: I have a solid foundation in testing fundamentals and methodologies, applying appropriate techniques to ensure high functional coverage and system stability. I use this knowledge to structure scalable, efficient, and maintainable automation architectures, aligned with team needs and business objectives.
about.goalDescription: Work as a QA Analyst applying automation and best practices from planning.
about.differentialDescription: Technical problem analysis, scalable test design, and focus on bug prevention.

experience.title: Professional Experience
responsibilities: Automated Web and API tests for 2 critical modules (Patients and Inventory) of the SGDoctor system, covering 100% of expected business flows, with validation of status codes, API contracts, and data integrity.
The automation reduced module validation time by 40% and enabled early project delivery, ensuring the release of 2 modules to production without critical bugs or regressions reported by users.

To achieve these results, I analyzed business rules with the team, modeled functional and negative test scenarios, automated critical Web and API flows, and executed recurring tests in pipelines, identifying failures preventively before the approval phase.
